step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your arms relaxed for now.
You're stretching your arms overhead well. Remember to keep your fingers open.
Great fist and downward push! Squeeze your shoulder blades together and inhale.
Excellent stretch back overhead while exhaling and relaxing. You're doing great!
You completed the first repetition smoothly. Keep up the good form.
Starting the second rep strong! Maintain that comfortable posture.
Arms are overhead nicely. Ensure your fingers are spread wide.
Good fist and downward motion. Remember to squeeze shoulder blades and inhale.
Fantastic stretch overhead, exhaling and relaxing. You're mastering this!
You've finished both repetitions with excellent form. Well done!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! You consistently followed the instructions to stretch your arms overhead, make a fist while pushing down, and squeeze your shoulder blades. Remember to keep your fingers open and breathe with each movement.
